column1: Life-Quotes
Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Creativity is more than just being different. Anybody can plan weird; that’s easy...
He thought moving to a small town would allow him to find a way to get along to ...
As my artist’s statement explains
column2: my work is utterly incomprehensible and is therefore full of deep significance.

column1: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
That's what careless words do. They make people love you a little less.
You don’t take a photograph
The backbone of surprise is fusing speed with secrecy.
I am not what happened to me
column2: I am what I choose to become.

column1: Never apologize for being sensitive or emotional. Let this be a sign ...
To the world you may be just one person
column2: but to one person you may be the world.

column1: We don’t make mistakes
Women have been trained to speak softly and carry a lipstick. Those days are over.
Do no harm but take no shit.
Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forward to the trip.
Dear haters
column2: I have so much more for you to be mad at. Just be patient.

column1: Positive thinking isn't ignoring your problems. It's having confidence in your ability to deal with them.
I am the designer of my own catastrophe.
When I look back on my life
column4: and heartache. When I look in the mirror

column1: You remind me of a penny... Two faced and not worth much.
You smell like hidden motives
Just because I'm smiling
column2: doesn't mean I don't want to hit you in the face.

column1: Remember that person you thought you couldn't live without? Well
The people who are quick to walk away are the ones who never intended to stay.
I've met some pricks in my time
No one looks back at their life and remembers the nights they had plenty of sleep.
Just chuck it in the fuck it bucket and move on.
I've found the key to happiness. Stay the hell away from assholes.
Having real friends makes dealing with everyone else worth it.
